title: I want to go live from my Unity Personal account. How do I do this?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I am a Unity Personal Edition user
  • I wish to 'Go Live' with my Unity Multiplayer game

sections.title: Cause
content: As Unity Multiplayer is a new Service, initially we have set it to Go Live only through a Pro license holder's account.

sections.title: Resolution
content: We are currently improving our backend systems to allow us to recognize Personal Edition users who have a payment instrument on file.
For now, if you are a Personal Edition user who wishes to Go Live with your game, please contact us and we will see what we can do to help.

sections.title: More Information
content: For more information on the Unity Multiplayer release, please see this Forum post.
